page.title: 13ROADS/ RAILWAYS IN ABERDOUR
page.content: In our area there is only one railway station and that is in{Aberdour.}On average{15}weekly tickets are sold to Edinburgh at {Â£11.60.}Two hundred and seventy nine trains stop there in a week and on average one thousand four hundred passengers get on and off each week. Also in{Aberdour}there is one petrol station /garage.The most popular petrol bought is four star.The average amount repaired there in a day is{4-5, and the average amount of cars that get petrol there a day is one hundred to one hundred and fifty.There is also another garage in Aberdour but it doesn't sell petrol it just repairs cars. The main road that passes through our area is the A92, which becomes the A987 to Kirkcaldy at the Braefoot roundabout.This can be a very busy main road.
